CREATE DATABASE demoDB
GO

USE demoDB
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Password01'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL myCredentialSAS
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-12-25T21:20:16Z&st=2024-10-20T12:20:16Z&spr=https&sig=RW0QcAdQVYoXoHK99LPAiKKGBMM9iPiUH%2F%2FMgmedl7c%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE myDataSourceSAS WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://lhadlsgen2storage.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = myCredentialDb
)
